text: Alcudia is a city on the island of Majorca. About 5,400 people live there. It used to be a fortified city to prevent attacks. Tourism is one of the main resources in the city, especially during the summer, which is known as the high season. == Other websites == * Alcudia tourist information * Alcudia and Playa de Muro information * Alcudia map and information Category:Municipalities in the Balearic Islands Category:Cities in the Balearic Islands Category:Mallorca
